Detailed Description

Read-Write lock

This class implements interface for Posix Read-Write lock. All errors are reported to by throwing an exception with error code contained into the error code of the exception, see Exception.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Util::RWLock::RWLock (  ) 

Constructor. The mutex is NOT locked when returning.

Util::RWLock::~RWLock (  ) 

destructor

Member Function Documentation

void Util::RWLock::initialize (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Initialize a (default case) mutex in unlock state.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
void Util::RWLock::rlock (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Read Lock request. Wait until access is granted. In case of success, the mutex is locked.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
bool Util::RWLock::rtrylock (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Read Lock if possible. If the mutex is already locked, then the method return false. The method returns true is case of success of locking the mutex.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
void Util::RWLock::terminate (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Explicit destroy. Must be called before the destructor is called.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
void Util::RWLock::unlock (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Unlock request. If the current thread holds the mutex, theb the method unlocks mutex. Else an exception is throwed.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
void Util::RWLock::wlock (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Write Lock request. Wait until access is granted. In case of success, the mutex is locked.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
bool Util::RWLock::wtrylock (  )  throw (PosixError) [inline]

Write Lock if possible. If the mutex is already locked, then the method return false. The method returns true is case of success of locking the mutex.

Exceptions:
PosixError with error code if error occurs
